metadata.Title: CVE-2017-13735 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
There is a floating point exception in the kodak_radc_load_raw function in dcraw_common.cpp in LibRaw 0.18.2. It will lead to a remote denial of service attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-13735` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.18.5-1
libraw16 - 0.18.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dcraw: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
exactimage: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
libraw package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.18.5-1').
rawtherapee: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
ufraw: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
